description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fl9o4","text":"Modified protocol from the manufacturer's protocol (Qiagen Quick-Start Protocol AllPrep DNA/RNA Mini Kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5h4jp","text":"Add  of RLT Plus Buffer to the 1.5 mL microtube with the blood sample on filter paper cut into small pieces (in 3 mm circles, equivalent to 50ul of whole blood), spin for  at 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":171,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f04uq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pcql","text":"Spanish: Añadir 600 ul de Buffer RLT Plus al microtubo de 1.5mL con la muestra de sangre en papel de filtro cortada en trozos pequeños (en círculos de 3mm, equivalente a 50ul de sangre total), hacer un \"spin\" por 15 segundos a 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"168BB740A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"1AF700A0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"719an","text":"Put the 1.5 mL microtube in a ThermoMixer at 55°C for  at 2000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3sgem","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4cpff","text":"Spanish: Colocar el microtubo de 1.5 mL en un ThermoMixer a 55°C por 30 minutos a 2000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"2F397700A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1on0d","text":"Add   of proteinase K, vortex and spin for  at 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"814ck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3r4g0","text":"Spanish: Añadir 65ul de proteinasa K, hacer vortex y un \"spin\" por 15 segundos a 10000 rpm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"65","error":false,"guid":"5F414D60A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"627B90D0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3uafv","text":"Put the 1.5 mL microtube in a ThermoMixer at 37°C for at least   (120 minutes) at 2000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"159jd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37ekh","text":"Spanish: Colocar el microtubo de 1.5 mL en un ThermoMixer a 37°C por al menos 2 horas a 2000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"792235F0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36u41","text":"Centrifuge the 1.5 mL tube with the sample for   at 13500 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5irau","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"16imp","text":"Spanish: centrifugar el tubo de 1.5 mL con la muestra por 3 minutos a 13500 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"8A58A4D0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vsu4","text":"Pipette the supernatant carefully to avoid touching the pellet with the tip (approx.  ). Transfer the supernatant into the DNA column (Allprep DNA) with collecting tube. Close carefully and centrifuge for  at 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":204,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6prfb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aurqt","text":"Spanish: Pipetear el sobrenadante con cuidado para evitar tocar el precipitado con el tip (aprox. 650ul). Transferir el sobrenadante dentro de la columna de DNA (Allprep DNA) con tubo colector. Cerrar con cuidado y centrifugar por 30 segundos a 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"650","error":false,"guid":"92F67450A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"97096480A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3og18","text":"Put the DNA column in a new collecting tube and reserve it. Recover the centrifuged sample (flow through) from the first collection tube and add the same volume of 70° ethanol (approx.  ), mix well with the pipette.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":185,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eklk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ib4q","text":"Spanish: Colocar la columna de DNA en un nuevo tubo colector y reservarla. Recuperar del primer tubo colector el centrifugado de la muestra (flow through) y añadirle el mismo volumen de etanol de 70° (aprox. 650ul), mezclar bien con la pipeta.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7qf7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"650","error":false,"guid":"A26EDF80A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aod23","text":"Transfer   of the sample homogenate with ethanol to the RNA column with collecting tube, centrifuge for   at 10000 rpm. Discard the flow through and add the remaining 650ul of the sample homogenate, centrifuge for 30 seconds at 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":104,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d93bb","text":"NOTE: Keep the collecting tube for the next 4 steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3hbn1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0roi","text":"Spanish: Transferir 650ul del homogenizado de la muestra con etanol a la columna de RNA con tubo colector, centrifugar por 30 segundos a 10000 rpm. Descartar el flow through y añadir los 650ul restantes del homogenenizado de la muestra, centrifugar por 30 segundos a 10000 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qjrr","text":"NOTA: conservar el tubo colector para los siguientes 4 pasos.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iqpk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"650","error":false,"guid":"AE79E950A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"B18AF9E0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5cv5","text":"Add   of RW1 buffer to the RNA column with collecting tube, centrifuge for   at 12000 rpm. Discard the flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3d3v6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiq7b","text":"Spanish: Añadir 700ul de buffer RW1 a la columna de RNA con tubo colector, centrifugar por 30 segundos a 12000 rpm. Descartar el flow through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ch60s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"700","error":false,"guid":"B86DABE0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"BC94C050A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5o77s","text":"Put the RNA column into a new 1.5mL tube. Add  of RNase-free water directly onto the column membrane without touching it. Wait 1 minute to hydrate the column. Centrifuge for   at 12500 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":174,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ba5g2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p3hf","text":"Spanish: Colocar la columna de RNA en un nuevo tubo de 1.5mL. Centrifugar por 1 minuto a 12500 rpm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"E2C29DB0A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"E5F7FF20A09111EC95DCBBE86D5AC41D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rvef","text":"To the DNA column reserved in step 7. Add   of Buffer AW1. Centrifuge for   at 12500 rpm. {"blocks":[{"key":"5fcge","text":"Using a sterile punch, cut 10 to 12 3 mm circles of blood from the filter paper (the aim is to have at least the equivalent of 50ul of blood for each collection).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7stm7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfd7e","text":"Spanish: Cortamos con un sacabocados estéril entre 10 y 12 círculos de 3 mm de tamaño del papel de filtro con sangre  (el objetivo es tener un equivalente mínimo de 50ul de sangre para cada extracción)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
